text.div:
PatientRelationshipType

A set of codes that can be used to indicate the relationship between a Patient and a RelatedPerson.

This value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are part of http://hl7.org/fhir/vs/patient-contact-relationship
  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleCode where concept is-a _PersonalRelationshipRoleType

name: PatientRelationshipType
description: A set of codes that can be used to indicate the relationship between a Patient and a RelatedPerson.
